name: UnofficialEasyFood
0:
”Alexa, ask unofficial easy food to give me a recipe”
”tell me a recipe”
”alexa, ask unofficial easy food to give me something easy to make”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: unofficial easy food
des:
Unofficial Easy Food contains various easy-to-make recipe names that can inspire dinner ideas. With over 30 recipes, mastering all of them will make your guests hungry for more! Easy food can help you better host dinner parties, social functions, and even make family dinners more exciting.

Unofficial Easy Food is not sponsored or endorsed by Zahra Publishing Ltd.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
